channel.title: How many before 04 still play?
channel.description:
I was wondering how many of us that started Runescape before 2004 still played. I being one of them started around sept 03.
If you feel like sharing you're details on when you started and stuff post about it.

item.title: How many before 04 still play?
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

[quote=“cooper, post:37, topic:306033”][quote author=the1337legend link=topic=402228.msg3031526#msg3031526 date=1258417292]
uhm, tbh the only things that can remember, from 03, was

  • getting lured to fight caves to attack a lvl 72 and die.

  • selling my purp phat for 150k (bought me a rune med chain and legs:D!)

  • sold 12k willows for a d2h, then d2h for a whip(this was about 5 months b4 3k update)

  • getting scammed of my rune mace.

  • being ranked 1.7k when hunter first came out (now it’s at 100kD:)

  • uhm, getting killed by damn shades/zombies/w.e the fuck else popped up at hills

  • pking at lvl 34 (non pure) in varrock, run in die from bser clans, come back with a clan, then kill that clan, as soon as thats done, get bsed by the clan i was just in again. continue.

  • camping at banks waiting for people to drop junk.

  • Getting my purp phat from a cracker (friend gave me it, i was about to drop it when i remembered he said “use it on someone”), i jizzed xD.

  • uhm, i wuz a victim of duriel (not on vid), i had nothing after listening to mods spam rs to death telling us to bank.

  • killed elvarg after about 12 deaths(was 28 combat).

  • merched barrows, best damn cash ever, roughly 2-5m an hour atleast, or robin sets, they were ok too i guess.

  • got my first obby shield drop (was worth 1.4m)

  • got my first d med drop (was worth 900k).

  • got my first good “i quit rs” drop, guthan pl8 (sold for 2.4m).

'list goes on
[/quote]
Most of those things were not in game until long after 2003.[/quote]

mhm, i played f2p for 2 years, all i did was kill rats in varrock, nothing big in that rlly? :l

Read full topic

item.title: How many before 04 still play?
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

[quote=“maminerr, post:31, topic:306033”][quote author=B2300 T4nk link=topic=402228.msg3004612#msg3004612 date=1256282891]

i started on '01 and am sadly still playing,
and lost around 1B probably
haha my runescape luck is shocking
[/quote] I dont have rs luck. Ive been lvl 76 for 2 yrs.

thats not based on luck,
its based on how lazy you are ;)[/quote]Im not lazy. My ass is stuck to my chair playing on the laptop like 15 hrs a day.

Read full topic

item.title: How many before 04 still play?
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

i played f2p till i think 05, never knew about classic (lol@me) till about 06 when i saw a friend was on it.

uhm, tbh the only things that can remember, from 03, was

  • getting lured to fight caves to attack a lvl 72 and die.

  • selling my purp phat for 150k (bought me a rune med chain and legs:D!)

  • sold 12k willows for a d2h, then d2h for a whip(this was about 5 months b4 3k update)

  • getting scammed of my rune mace.

  • being ranked 1.7k when hunter first came out (now it’s at 100kD:)

  • uhm, getting killed by damn shades/zombies/w.e the fuck else popped up at hills

  • pking at lvl 34 (non pure) in varrock, run in die from bser clans, come back with a clan, then kill that clan, as soon as thats done, get bsed by the clan i was just in again. continue.

  • camping at banks waiting for people to drop junk.

  • Getting my purp phat from a cracker (friend gave me it, i was about to drop it when i remembered he said “use it on someone”), i jizzed xD.

  • uhm, i wuz a victim of duriel (not on vid), i had nothing after listening to mods spam rs to death telling us to bank.

  • killed elvarg after about 12 deaths(was 28 combat).

  • merched barrows, best damn cash ever, roughly 2-5m an hour atleast, or robin sets, they were ok too i guess.

  • got my first obby shield drop (was worth 1.4m)

  • got my first d med drop (was worth 900k).

  • got my first good “i quit rs” drop, guthan pl8 (sold for 2.4m).

'list goes on

uhm, i don’t play as often anymore tbh, after that new quest for chiv/piety, i spent like, 4m on 62 pray, which basically dropped half my cash left from when i gave all my shit out a week before 3k update (the day jagex warned us to transfer a week ahead of time, because the update), was total of 492m i believe, either that or 392, i remember it was 92 at the end… then my friend quit and used all that cash pking, about a year after i “quit”. hilly luring fails tbh.
then i got 99 cook, since that was my favorite skill since i started (only because i could have made a decent 30m+ from it back then, i can still make 10m from it now, but it’s slow).
got my firecape at lvl 82(biggest fluke every tbh, but i won’t explainit).

uhhh yh…back to homework…

Read full topic

item.title: How many before 04 still play?
item.dc:creator: @Old_Rsc_Player Old Rsc Player
item.description:
@Old_Rsc_Player wrote:

[quote=“cooper, post:26, topic:306033”][quote author=Old Rsc Player link=topic=402228.msg3000406#msg3000406 date=1255927814]

2000 in 03 I quit until 06, then played on and off til may 09 then quit after merching got really bad.

Lies, Runescape wasn’t released until 2001.

Released in 2000, about 14 people got to play, 2001 was release for public.
[/quote]
Even if that is true, I doubt he is one of the 14.[/quote]

Oh Im not, I started playing in january 01 as my cousins got me into it. However I do know 3 people whos played in 2000, 14 is just a guess it could be anywhere from 10-20, but 14s my guess.

Read full topic

item.title: How many before 04 still play?
item.dc:creator: @Man_UTD_Freak Man UTD Freak
item.description:
@Man_UTD_Freak wrote:

I started playing Runescape sometime in 2003 and became seriously addicted to it until 2007.

I didn’t play Runescape as regularly in 2007 and 2008.

At present, I barely play Runescape (about once a month to tell you the truth).

Read full topic
